sentences.sContent: The image below is an example of showing an image and some text simultaneously.
sentences.sContent_eng: The image below is an example of showing an image and some text simultaneously.
sentences.sCn: 下面的图像是同时显示图像和一些文本的示例。

sentences.sContent: It will save considerable machining time to use more than one tool in one machine to perform several machine operations either in sequence or simultaneously.
sentences.sContent_eng: It will save considerable machining time to use more than one tool in one machine to perform several machine operations either in sequence or simultaneously.
sentences.sCn: 在一台机器上使用数种刀具来顺次或同时进行几项机器操作， 将节省大量加工时间。

sentences.sContent: If they have multiple test cases that will be run on the same platforms, they can select multiple configurations simultaneously and apply the configurations to several of them in batch mode.
sentences.sContent_eng: If they have multiple test cases that will be run on the same platforms, they can select multiple configurations simultaneously and apply the configurations to several of them in batch mode.
sentences.sCn: 如果他们拥有多个将要运行在同一个平台上的测试用例的话，那么他们能够同时选择多个配置，并且将这些配置批量应用到平台上。

words.tran: 同时的；联立的；同时发生的
同时；[计][力] 同时性；同时发生
